title: BountyDetective
author: BountyDetective
created_time: September 13, 2023, 12:59:19 PMLast edit: March 19, 2024, 06:08:26 PM by BountyDetective
content: BOUNTY IS OVER✍️ Myra Bounty Distribution Information♦️ Myra's bounty allocation of 200,000,000 MYRA has been successfully distributed by the Bounty Detective team.Therefore, the bounty distribution is completed. You can check your bounty balance here.♦️ Follow up-to-date information about Myra project by joining their Telegram Group.✔️ ALL DISTRIBUTED BOUNTIES📃 Page 1📃 Page 2📃 Page 3📃 Page 4📃 Page 5♦️ You can participate in the ongoing bounties on our Bounty Telegram Channel.Kind Regards,  Bounty Detective Team ★ WEBSITE ★ WHITEPAPER ★ TELEGRAM ★ TWITTER ★ TIKTOK ★ INSTAGRAM ★  MEDIUM ★ GITHUB ★ REDDIT ★____________________________________________1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Detective. 2. 200,000,000 MYRA tokens (2% of the total supply) are to be divided according tothe stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on September 13th, 2023 and will run until November 21th, 2023.4. The reward distribution of Myra Bounty is guaranteed by Bounty Detective for the current contract.The distribution will begin on 15th March, 2024.______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Detective may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joined campaigns if needed.Bounty Detective is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoing bounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread.Bounty Detective has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are only responsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Detective has escrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty." The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards by calculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet.The current token's contract ensures the reward distribution of the bounty rewards, guaranteed by Bounty Detective. Please note that we willnot be held responsible in the event of a token swap or migration.Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published. However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can't guarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers. We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Kind regards.______________________1. All participants must join Myra's official Telegram Group,  Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. All participants must join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel,mTwitter and YouTube Channel.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Detective's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns while,20+ activity counts on the article campaign8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participants’ forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the Article and Video campaign.10. Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.11. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.12. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.13. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …[b]Short Video Campaign[/b]TikTok/Instagram/YouTube Username:Spreadsheet No:Short Videos Url:1. …2. …3. …Twitter              25%Telegram          17%TikTok               10%Video                14%Article               18%Translation        16%Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 1000 approved participants.Telegram: First 800 approved participants.TikTok: First 400 approved participants.Video: Top 150 Videos will be selected.Article: Top 175 articles will be selected.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (13.09 -19.09)Week 2 (20.09 - 26.09)Week 3 (27.09 - 03.10)Week 4 (04.10 - 10.10)Week 5 (11.10 - 17.10)Week 6 (18.10 - 24.10)Week 7 (25.10 - 31.10)Week 8 (01.11 - 07.11)Week 9 (08.11 - 14.11)Week 10 (15.11 - 21.11)--> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Myra’s Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #myra #myratoken #blabber #cryptotrading #crypto #btc #bsc #eth hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join The Myra’s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/nZhsbDUyfXjAY9Ud6Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Myra Ambassador.(Example: BountyDetective | Myra Ambassador)2. Replace your profile picture with this Logo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear Myra avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join The Myra’s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/u9eccMLCcgRxshbr6Rewards:  1. Have more than 200 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 2000 views: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Myra’s TikTok.2. TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 30 followers.2. Videos need to be unique and have at least 200 views to qualify. 3. Videos need to be a minimum of 20 secs in length. 4. Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.5. Participants have to shoot 3 unique videos per week (maximum 1 video/day).6. Participants must use #myra #myratoken #blabber #cryptotrading #crypto #btc #bsc #et hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join The Myra's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/fv42UsyJfGq9haT46Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Each participant can write 1 article only.2. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.3. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.4. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.5. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.6. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.7. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, Staking / Liquidity rewards, Presale,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, etc.8. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join The Myra’s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/S6rV9dcepu9Lqi5G7Note: Article submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >5000 views)Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >700 views)Rules:  1. Every participant must follow Myra’s YouTube Channel.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Participants must have at least 700+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.4. Participants' forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign.5. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.7. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded.There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices.8. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.9. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.10. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.11. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!12. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join The Myra’s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/XmN5GhjXnNmVcHuV9Note: Article submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.Translation of our Whitepaper and One Pager are required in 12 languages: Spanish, French, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Russian, Portuguese, Malaysian, Filipino, Vietnamese and Chinese.Rewards:  Whitepaper Translation: 100 stakesRules:  1. Translation of our Whitepaper required in 12 languages: Spanish, French, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Russian, Portuguese, Malaysian, Filipino, Vietnamese and Chinese.2. Translators must be a native speaker of the aforementioned languages.3. Translators must have work experience as a translator in other Bounty programs (links to your previous works).4. Please fill the registration to reserve your native language. Do not start the translation before getting approval from the BM.5. Translations by using translator programs will be disqualified from all of the Bounty Detective Bounties.6. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project team can use all of these translations as marketing materials.7. Upon completion of translation, send the link to your work using THIS FORMHow to join:1. Join The Myra’s official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/vBM2M1iZuhnhGsfk8
